channel.title: tngky blog site
channel.description: Recent content on tngky blog site

item.title: Unity_ml_agents
item.description: Installation vc2015:https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe cuda:可选 gpu Install Python Python (recommend installing Python 3.6 or 3.7) If you are using Windows, please install the x86-64 version and not x86 Configuration: 创建虚拟环境: py -m venv venv 进入虚拟环境: venv\Scripts\activate Packages: 更新pip: py -m pip install –upgrade pip 安装pytorch: pip install torch==1.8.1 -i http://pypi.douban.com/simple –trusted-host pypi.douban.com 安装mlagents: pip install mlagents (如果出2020问题加参数 –use-feature=2020-resolver )

item.title: Unity_tips
item.description: Inspector:static = true 确保这个物体在游戏场景中为静态的、不会移动的物体，进而在游戏的运行过程中让游戏有更加流畅的运行体验

item.title: Unity_vr
item.description: Requirements Unity Editor(minimum supported version 2019.4 LTS) Oculus companion app Configuration Oculus Download the Oculus companion app and set up user account. Go to Devices > Configure Rift > Full Setup. Follow the on-screen instructions to run the full setup. Follow the in-VR instructions to complete the generic device settings. Unity Unity Hub Open Unity Hub and click the Installs tab. Click the three dots next to the Unity 2019.

item.title: github pages with hugo
item.description: Hugo 基本使用配置，发布到github pages
